name: noosphere-evm
description: End-to-end testing scripts for the Noosphere EVM protocol.

scripts.test:e2e: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -s client --names "ANVIL,DEPLOY,AGENT,CLIENT" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,green" "npm run anvil" "sleep 2 && npm run deploy" "sleep 15 && npm run agent" "sleep 20 && npm run client && npx kill-port 8545"
scripts.test:e2e:optimistic: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -s client --names "ANVIL,DEPLOY,AGENT,CLIENT" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,green" "npm run anvil" "sleep 2 && npm run deploy" "sleep 15 && node webapp/src/optimistic_agent.js" "sleep 20 && node webapp/src/optimistic_client.js && npx kill-port 8545"
